models.bus_route_model module

Author: Samiul Ahamed Fhyas

class models.bus_route_model.BusRouteModel[source]

Bases: object

Data access for bus routes and list of buses.

static all_enriched_routes() → List[Dict][source]

Get all routes with enriched data (fare, rating, bus_type, etc.).

Returns:

List of enriched route dictionaries with additional fields:

  • bus_type: AC or Non-AC

  • operator: Bus operator name

  • rating: Bus rating

  • fare: Estimated fare

  • departure_time: Departure time as string

  • seat_availability: Available seats

  • from: Source location

  • to: Destination location

Return type:

List[Dict]

static distinct_stations_and_operators() → Dict[str, List[str]][source]

Get distinct stations and operators from all routes.

Returns:

Dictionary with keys:

  • stations: Sorted list of unique station names

  • operators: Sorted list of unique operator names

Return type:

Dict[str, List[str]]

static get_all_routes() → List[Dict][source]

Get all bus routes from the database.

Returns:

List of all bus route dictionaries

Return type:

List[Dict]

static get_route_by_id(route_id: int) → Dict | None[source]

Get a bus route by its ID.

Parameters:

route_id (int) – ID of the route to retrieve

Returns:

Route dictionary if found, None otherwise

Return type:

Optional[Dict]

static search_routes(src: str, dst: str, departure_date: str | None = None, bus_type: str | None = None, operator: str | None = None, price_min: float | None = None, price_max: float | None = None, sort_by: str | None = None) → List[Dict][source]

Search routes by source and destination with optional filters.

Parameters:

  • src (str) – Source location

  • dst (str) – Destination location

  • departure_date (Optional[str]) – Travel date (currently not used in filtering)

  • bus_type (Optional[str]) – Filter by bus type (AC/Non-AC)

  • operator (Optional[str]) – Filter by operator name

  • price_min (Optional[float]) – Minimum price filter

  • price_max (Optional[float]) – Maximum price filter

  • sort_by (Optional[str]) – Sort by ‘price’, ‘rating’, or ‘departure’

Returns:

List of enriched route dictionaries matching the search criteria

Return type:

List[Dict]

static suggest_alternatives(src: str, dst: str) → List[Dict][source]

Suggest alternative routes that share the source or destination when no exact match.

Parameters:

  • src (str) – Source location

  • dst (str) – Destination location

Returns:

List of up to 10 alternative route suggestions

Return type:

List[Dict]
